channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: It'll be OK: DCG crisis likely won’t ‘include a lot of selling’ — Novogratz
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Digital Currency Group’s ongoing financial distress isn’t likely to cause much further strain on crypto prices, according to Galaxy Digital Holdings CEO Mike Novogratz.

item.title: Voyager and Binance.​US deal given initial nod amid national security probe
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The deal has received initial approval from the bankruptcy judge but will require the approval of creditors and final court approval.

item.title: Death and self-custody: How to pass on your crypto when you die
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Crypto lawyers suggest including highly detailed instructions in one’s will and appointing a crypto-savvy next-of-kin, among other suggestions.

item.title: Blockchain privacy groups urge new US Congress to protect privacy rights
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Digital advocacy group Fight for the Future has rounded up a group of prominent signatories to its appeal for digital privacy, balanced power and human rights.

item.title: Albright Capital drops lawsuit against Terraform Labs and Do Kwon
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Terraform Labs is the founder of US Dollar Terra (UST), an algorithmic stablecoin that lost its peg in May.

item.title: Binance pushes back against report stablecoin isn’t fully backed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The crypto exchange said there was a “timing mismatch in backing Binance-Peg BUSD with BUSD” that seemingly showed data in which the stablecoin was not fully backed.

item.title: UK MP says stablecoin is a gateway to CBDC, only crypto can ‘disrupt’ settlements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: MP Andrew Griffith and colleagues spoke before a hearing of the U.K. parliamentary Treasury Committee about payments technology and CBDC.

item.title: Crypto.com delists USDT for Canadian users following OSC ban
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Registered cryptocurrency exchanges in Ontario, Canada, cannot list USDT due to regulatory prohibition.

item.title: Sandeep Nailwal-backed Web3 accelerator launches demo day for first cohort
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: The Web3 developer program received interest from over 1,000 projects but only 15 were selected for Cohort 0.

item.title: Crypto exchanges need to start giving customers their keys
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mark Basa
item.description: Exchanges should introduce decentralized finance to their centralized models to protect their customers and restore confidence in cryptocurrency.

item.title: Flare (FLR) airdrops 15% of total supply to XRP holders before correcting by 76%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: After a two-year wait, the layer 1 Flare blockchain finally followed through, sending its tokens to those who held XRP at the time of the snapshot.

item.title: Crypto service Tap Global becomes first 2023 listing on UK stock exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The company provides regulated bank accounts and offers crypto purchases through affiliated exchanges.

item.title: Ex-Coinbase manager’s brother sentenced to 10 months in insider trading case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: It is believed to be the first insider trading case involving cryptocurrency.

item.title: 5 signs that an altcoin bull run could be underway
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Record-low volatility and potentially positive macroeconomic data are providing crypto traders with a few opportunities.

item.title: US lawmakers call on court to approve ‘independent examiner’ in FTX bankruptcy case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Four U.S. Senators said Sullivan & Cromwell was “simply not in a position to uncover the information needed to ensure confidence in any investigation or findings” regarding FTX.

item.title: Yearn​.finance opens vault deployment access to all users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “All factory-deployed vaults have no management fees and a flat 10% performance fee,” the DeFi project wrote.

item.title: The Easy Company secures $14.2M funding for new crypto wallet with social features
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The company says it wants to make it easier for users to engage with Web3 and use digital wallets.

item.title: Nebraskangooner gives his opinions on whether news affects BTC price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Nebraskangooner gave his thoughts on multiple topics in the latest episode of the Crypto Trading Secrets podcast, including his opinions on Bitcoin in the bear market.

item.title: Manta Network conducts record-breaking trusted setup ceremony, 4,000+ contribute
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: A trusted setup ceremony is an initial process needed to secure systems that utilize zero-knowledge proofs.

item.title: Remote work could redefine the global workforce for good
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: While implementing remote work structures seems to be a priority for most tech firms, there are still some concerns about its long-term efficacy.

item.title: AI altcoins are pumping — Is this the beginning of the next bull market? The Market Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident experts discuss artificial intelligence altcoins, what they are, and whether they could lead us into the next bull market.

item.title: Cosmos EUR stablecoin project to unwind after 2 years
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “The lack of real-world applications for blockchain has led to low demand for non-USD stablecoins,” e-Money wrote.

item.title: Bitcoin price targets include new $14K dip as Fed’s Powell avoids inflation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: No fresh BTC price catalyst from the Fed as Chair Jerome Powell fails to mention inflation altogether.

item.title: Your guide to crypto in Toronto: Crypto City
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elias Ahonen

item.title: Cameron Winklevoss: ‘There is no path forward as long as Barry Silbert remains CEO of DCG’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Recursive trades between the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust and the Three Arrows Capital hedge fund allegedly inflated assets, according to an open letter from the Gemini co-founder.

item.title: South Korean regulators target Bithumb in new probe
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The South Korean National Tax Service agency launches an investigation into Bithumb, according to local reports.

item.title: Binance employees to adhere to 90-day period prior to trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange confirmed the three-month policy to prohibit insider trading by employees and their relevant family members.

item.title: Coinbase to cut another 20% of its workforce in second wave of layoffs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto exchange Coinbase announced a further restructuring plan that involves reducing its workforce by 950 employees to cut operational costs amid the bear market.

item.title: Bitcoin price holds $17K into Fed Powell speech as GBTC jumps to multi-month highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin, crypto and risk asset traders await dovish signals from Fed Chair Jerome Powell ahead of fresh CPI data later in the week.

item.title: Ripple exec expects more crypto acquisitions by TradFi in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto acquisitions in 2023 will further strengthen the industry in the aftermath of casualties like the FTX collapse, a Ripple exec predicts.
